body_html: Can you manually change the ipynb's kernel to your py2.7 kernel spec (the jupyter menu)? If you don't have a py2.7 kernel spec you can create one using the standard jupyter techniques (google search). You may want to use virtualenv to isolate your tensorflow related setup.
body_text: Can you manually change the ipynb's kernel to your py2.7 kernel spec (the jupyter menu)? If you don't have a py2.7 kernel spec you can create one using the standard jupyter techniques (google search). You may want to use virtualenv to isolate your tensorflow related setup.
body: Can you manually change the ipynb's kernel to your py2.7 kernel spec (the jupyter menu)? If you don't have a py2.7 kernel spec you can create one using the standard jupyter techniques (google search). You may want to use virtualenv to isolate your tensorflow related setup.
